title: IAA Tonight | How Can the Lakers Fix Their Problems? AND Ben Simmons Continues to Struggle.
description: The Lakers have a lot of holes to fix, but how can they fix them? What moves can be made in order for them to be a viable championship contender? Plus, Ben Simmons continues to struggle, and one host doesn't hold back on their thoughts about his shortcomings in Brooklyn thus far this season.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Chantel Tremetiere, Antoine Walkers)
